meanings.definition: A type of sweet dessert made with a thin sheet of sponge cake spread with jelly or jam and rolled up into a spiral.
meanings.sent1: I love to bake jellyrolls for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: She bought a delicious jellyroll from the bakery.
meanings.sent3: The jellyrolls at the party disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her jellyroll was as sweet as a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The jellyroll melted in my mouth, leaving a fruity taste behind.

meanings.definition: Excess fat around the waistline that hangs over the top of pants or skirts.
meanings.sent1: He felt self-conscious about his jellyrolls showing.
meanings.sent2: She decided to start exercising to reduce her jellyrolls.
meanings.sent3: His jellyrolls jiggled as he danced around the room.
meanings.sent4: The jellyrolls seemed to have a life of their own.
meanings.sent5: The jellyrolls made it hard for him to find clothes that fit comfortably.
